botania.page.livingwoodTools0:
$(1)Livingwood$(0) can be shaped into tools by AIOT Botania.
The tools have properties like $(1)Wood$(0), albeit somewhat superior in enchantability and durability. Whenever a $(1)Livingwood$(0) item is to take damage, if there's $(4)Mana$(0) available in the inventory (such as a $(1)Mana Tablet$(0)), it'll use that instead.
Apart from the damage, they're like the vanilla tools.
botania.page.livingrockTools0:
$(1)Livingrock$(0) can be shaped into tools by AIOT Botania.
The tools have properties like $(1)Stone$(0), albeit somewhat superior in enchantability, durability and a few tweaks. Whenever a $(1)Livingrock$(0) item is to take damage, if there's $(4)Mana$(0) available in the inventory (such as a $(1)Mana Tablet$(0)), it'll use that instead.
The tools are like improved vanilla tools.
botania.page.manaGear11:
Because $(2)AIOT Botania$(0) is installed there is one more item. The Botania $(1)Hoe$(0) can convert Farmland back to dirt additionally.
The $(1)AIOT$(0) is like a fusion out of $(1)Manasteel Sword$(0), $(1)Pickaxe$(0), $(1)Axe$(0), $(1)Shovel$(0) and $(1)Hoe$(0) and combines all of their features.
botania.page.elfGear10: The $(1)Elementium Sword$(0) will increase the chance of a $(4)Pixie$(0) spawning when hit (this holds true when no $(1)Elementium Armor$(0) is worn) and increases the strength of any $(4)Pixies$(0) spawned.
botania.page.elfGear16: The $(1)Elementium Hoe$(0) by Botania now tills a dirt block or something similar into a farmland block which doesn't break by jumping on it. With this farmland you don't need water nearby, the block is wet everytime. This farmland increases the growth speed of crops. When right-clicking on farmland the farmland converts back to grass.
botania.page.elfGear17:
Lastly, the $(1)Elementium AIOT$(0) fusions all the special effects of the other $(1)Elementium$(0) tools.
Because you can place $(4)saplings$(0) and $(4)torches$(0) with axe and pickaxe, there is a mode which can be toggled by $(4)shift-right clicking$(0). One mode is for tilling and create grass paths, the other mode is for placing saplings and torches.
